actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill designating the park established pursuant to the Act of April 25, 1947 (61 Stat. 52), as the "Theodore Roosevelt National Park."

summary.text: Changes the name of the Theodore Roosevelt National Memorial Park in Medora, North Dakota, to the Theodore Roosevelt National Park.

titles.title: A bill designating the park established pursuant to the Act of April 25, 1947 (61 Stat. 52), as the "Theodore Roosevelt National Park."
